messages.subject: DVD news
messages.msgSnippet: If you, like me, have a collection of various movies/dramas in .avi format that play only on the computer in Divx or whatever then take a look at this
messages.messageBody:
If you, like me, have a collection of various movies/dramas in .avi
format that play only on the computer in Divx or whatever then take a
look at this baby---The PhilipsDVP642 that retails for like $70--yes
that's right $70.

Apparently it plays EVERYTHING even foreign region coded movies....(I
can almost hear the Japanese version of Mibugishiden with the cool
extras disc calling my name now...)
Here's a link to some reviews and such

http://reviews.cnet.com/Philips_DVP642/4505-6473_7-30959433.html





--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
